DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of this study is to constitute a biotheque of patients with meningococcal disease to enable results to be interpreted and genetic factors to be determined
DOC.brief_title: Creation of a Biotheque of Patients of Seine-Maritime With Meningococcal Infection
DOC.criteria: Subjects of SeineMaritime with a meningococcal disease from the year of 2000 parental authority assent if necessary no parental authority assent child under supervision
